member.name: M:WebSharper.IInitializer.PreInitialize(System.String)
member.summary: Called during the preparation phase of initialization. This is guaranteed to run before any IInitializer's Initialize and before any IControl's Body. The order between the PreInitialize of two IInitializers is unspecified.

member.name: M:WebSharper.IInitializer.PostInitialize(System.String)
member.summary: Called during the final phase of initialization. This is guaranteed to run after any IInitializer's Initialize and after any IControl's Body. The order between the PostInitialize of two IInitializers is unspecified.

member.name: M:WebSharper.IInitializer.Initialize(System.String)
member.summary: Called during the main phase of initialization. The order between the Initialize of two IInitializers is unspecified.

member.name: T:WebSharper.IInitializer
member.summary: An interface that has to be implemented by controls that are subject to activation but are not attached to a specific DOM element.

member.name: T:WebSharper.IControl
member.summary: An interface that has to be implemented by controls that are subject to activation, ie. server-side controls that contain client-side elements.

member.name: M:WebSharper.IControlBody.ReplaceInDom(WebSharper.JavaScript.Dom.Node)
member.summary: Replace the given node with the HTML content. The node is guaranteed to be present in the DOM. Called exactly once on startup on an IControl's Body.

member.name: T:WebSharper.IControlBody
member.summary: HTML content that can be used as the Body of a web Control. Can be zero, one or many DOM nodes.

member.name: T:WebSharper.IRequiresResources
member.summary: An interface that has to be implemented by controls that depend on resources.
